title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Women's Singles Results
text: March 23, 2018 / 1:10 AM / Updated 32 minutes ago   Women's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2   Results   Women's Singles   1st Round .. Petra Martic (CRO) beat Lauren Davis (USA) 6-1 7-5 Donna Vekic (CRO) beat Camila Giorgi (ITA) 6-0 7-5 Monica Puig (PUR) beat Samantha Stosur (AUS) 6-3 6-4 .. 2nd Round .. 1-Simona Halep (ROU) beat Oceane Dodin (FRA) 3-6 6-3 7-5 30-Agnieszka Radwanska beat Alison Van Uytvanck (BEL) 6-3 7-6(4) (POL) 20-Anastasija Sevastova beat Alize Cornet (FRA) 7-5 6-4 (LAT) Victoria Azarenka (BLR) beat 14-Madison Keys (USA) 7-6(5) (Retired) Carina Witthoeft (GER) beat 12-Julia Goerges (GER) 7-6(2) 4-6 6-4 Zarina Diyas (KAZ) beat 18-Svetlana Kuznetsova 6-1 6-3 (RUS) Su-Wei Hsieh (TPE) beat 32-Sorana Cirstea (ROU) 7-5 6-2 5-Karolina Pliskova (CZE) beat Ekaterina Makarova (RUS) 7-5 7-5 Christina McHale (USA) beat 25-Barbora Strycova (CZE) 6-1 6-4 Monica Niculescu (ROU) beat 17-Magdalena Rybarikova 6-3 6-3 (SVK) 13-Sloane Stephens (USA) beat Ajla Tomljanovic (AUS) 6-1 6-3 10-Angelique Kerber (GER) beat Johanna Larsson (SWE) 6-2 6-2 23-Anastasia beat Aliaksandra Sasnovich 6-2 3-6 6-2 Pavlyuchenkova (RUS) (BLR) Yafan Wang (CHN) beat 27-Carla Suarez Navarro 7-5 6-3 (ESP) Alison Riske (USA) beat 7-Caroline Garcia (FRA) 6-3 6-1
